titleStmt.title: A specimen of a comment on the Old Testament by the taghmical art in III parts, I. on the textual, classical or doctrinal scriptures, II. on the doubtful, difficult, and wrong translated places, III. an analysis, with intermix'd observations, as matter requires thoro the rest, to make the whole compleat ...
titleStmt.author: Cross, Walter, M.A.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
